div.p: You are invited to a friend's birthday. You respond thanking him/her. Suggest some different ways that you can help him/her.
I'm so glad you're invited me, it's been a while that we haven't seen each other ! 20 years, don't you feel old ? haha

Sunday will be a perfect day to organize that : i'm on holidays so if you need someone's help you know the person to call. If you want, i can go to the shop buying some beers and chips, my parents left me the car for the week-end. I can bring my DJ set to put the fire during the party ( and of course some girls )
